metadata.description: The Republic Poker Run (TRPR) is a collection from The Republic Of Apes that acts as your entry into giveaways. Owners in the collection will be entered into regular poker runs and events from The Republic Of Apes. The metadata will be shuffled before each run and is ever-changing. Your cards will be revealed before the end of each run and prizes will be handed out to the winning hands.
metadata.name: The Republic Poker Run #1
